entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 19 February 2023
